short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add AI-powered commands to your browserâ€™s right-click menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Smudge is a browser extension that puts AI tools powered by ChatGPT into your right-click menu, so you can do things like Revise/Translate/Summarize just as easily as commands you already use, like Cut/Copy/Paste. Itâ€™s one of the easiest ways to integrate AI into your everyday workflow. There are over a dozen built-in commands you can use for free, or you can create your own custom commands in the pro version for $5/mo.

Popular commands
âž¤ Summarize. Briefly recap the main points of a long article or document.
âž¤ Correct. Fix any spelling, punctuation, and grammar mistakes.
âž¤ Bulletize. Convert walls of text into a concise bullet-point list.
âž¤ Refine. Polish and revise your writing to improve its readability.
âž¤ Translate. Translate text from just about any language.

You can also create your own commands. Use custom commands to automate repetitive tasks, improve upon our built-in commands, or do something fun and creative.

For example:
âž¤ Extract a concise bullet-point to-do list from an email.
âž¤ Improve the readability and flow of your website copy.
âž¤ Describe the functionality of computer code in plain English.
âž¤ Rewrite an email to make it more friendly or professional
âž¤ Generate study notes from a passage, using markdown formatting for headers and lists.

Pricing

Free tier:
- No account required
- Never expires
- 10 GPT-3.5 commands every 8 hours
- No custom commands
- ~1,000-word limit per command

$5/mo subscription tier:
- Custom commands
- More powerful AI (GPT-4)
- Unlimited devices
- 2,000 monthly 
credits
- ~12,000-word limit per command

$20/mo subscription tier:
- Everything in the $5/mo tier
- 10,000 monthly credits
